The mountain was adorned with innumerable sāla trees,🔽tamāla trees,
champaka trees,
ashvakarṇa trees,

He was together with a great assembly of 8,000 bhikṣus.

original: 復有九十九俱胝那庾多百千菩薩俱。
analyzed: 復有九十九俱胝那庾多百千菩薩俱。
translated: There were also 99 koṭīs of nayutas of hundreds of thousands of bodhisattvas.
There were innumerable hundreds of thousands of gods from the Pure Abodes.

analyzed: 自在大自在梵王天子而為上首。
translated: Mahêśvara and Maheśvara, the Brahmā kings and celestial sons, were at the head.

analyzed: 時觀自在菩薩與無量持明仙圍遶。

analyzed: 頭面禮足右遶世尊三匝。
translated: he bowed his head to the Buddha's feet, circumambulated the World-Honored One three times to the right,
and then sat to one side and said to the Buddha,

original: 世尊我有心密語名十一面。
analyzed: 世尊我有心密語名十一面。
translated: World-Honored One, I have a mind-secret mantra called the Eleven Faces,

original: 十一俱胝如來同共宣說。
analyzed: 十一俱胝如來同共宣說。
translated: which was proclaimed together by eleven koṭis of Tathāgatas.
I will now speak it.
For the benefit and peace of all sentient beings,
it can remove all illnesses,
stop all inauspicious bad dreams,
and prevent untimely death.
It can cause those with impure faith to have pure faith,
and can remove all obstacles and vetālas.
Because all hopes and wishes are fulfilled,

original: 我不見於天世魔世梵世及沙門婆羅門眾。
analyzed: 我不見於天世魔世梵世及沙門婆羅門眾。
translated: I do not see in the heavens, the worlds of demons, Brahmā, śramaṇas, or brāhmaṇas

original: 以此心密語加護救濟攝受。
analyzed: 以此心密語加護救濟攝受。
translated: this mind-secret mantra for protection, rescue, and acceptance,
to stop calamities, bring auspiciousness, and avoid punishment,
and to be free from knives, sticks, and poisonous substances.

original: 若有能違越者無有是處。
analyzed: 若有能違越者無有是處。
translated: If there are any who violate this, it is impossible.

original: 唯除宿業不決定心受持此密語一切如來稱讚護念。
analyzed: 唯除宿業不決定心受持此密語一切如來稱讚護念。
translated: Except for past karma, the mind that does not definitely accept and uphold this secret mantra is praised and protected by all tathāgatas.

original: 一切如來隨喜世尊我念過去。
analyzed: 一切如來隨喜世尊我念過去。
translated: All tathāgatas rejoice. I, the World-Honored One, remember in the past.
After eons equal to the sands of the Ganges River,

original: 有如來名百蓮花眼髻無障礙無染力光王如來。
analyzed: 有如來名百蓮花眼髻無障礙無染力光王如來。
translated: there was a tathāgata named Hundred Lotus Flower Eye Topknot Unobstructed Unstained Power Light King Tathāgata.
At that time, I was a great sage.
I received this mind secret mantra from that tathāgata.

original: 纔受得已十方一切如來現前。
analyzed: 纔受得已十方一切如來現前。
translated: As soon as I received it, all tathāgatas in the ten directions appeared before me.

original: 得見一切如來故便獲得無生法忍。
analyzed: 得見一切如來故便獲得無生法忍。
translated: Because I got to see all tathāgatas, I immediately attained the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas.

original: 此密語有如是大功德藏。
analyzed: 此密語有如是大功德藏。
translated: This secret mantra has such a great treasury of merit and virtue.
If there are good men and good women,
with a pure faithful mind and a reverent mind,
remembering and paying attention to it,
in this present life they will attain ten kinds of benefits.
What are the ten?
First, being free from all illnesses,
Second, all tathāgatas will accept and embrace them.

original: 三者任運獲得金銀財寶諸穀麥等。
analyzed: 三者任運獲得金銀財寶諸穀麥等。
translated: Third, they will effortlessly obtain gold, silver, wealth, grain, wheat, and other things.

original: 四者一切怨敵不能沮壞。
analyzed: 四者一切怨敵不能沮壞。
translated: Fourth, all enemies will not be able to obstruct or destroy them.

original: 五者國王王子在於王宮先言慰問。
analyzed: 五者國王王子在於王宮先言慰問。
translated: Fifth, kings and princes will first greet them with kind words in the royal palace.
Sixth, they will not be harmed by poison or sorcery.
Illnesses such as cold, heat, and so forth will not afflict their bodies.

original: 七者一切刀杖所不能害。
analyzed: 七者一切刀杖所不能害。
translated: Seventh, all swords and staves will not be able to harm them.
Eighth, water will not be able to drown them.
Ninth, fire will not be able to burn them.
Tenth, they will not die an untimely death.
Moreover, they will attain four kinds of merits.

original: 一者臨命終時得見如來。
analyzed: 一者臨命終時得見如來。
translated: First, when they are about to die, they will get to see the Tathāgata.
Second, they will not be reborn in evil realms.
Third, they will not die an untimely death.

original: 四者從此世界得生極樂國土。
analyzed: 四者從此世界得生極樂國土。
translated: Fourth, from this world, they will be reborn in the Land of Supreme Bliss.
World-Honored One, I recall that in the past,
after ten Ganges sands eons had passed,
there was a Buddha named Mandarava Fragrance Tathāgata.
At that time, I was an elder.
I received this mind-secret mantra from that Tathāgata.
It transcends four hundred thousand eons of birth and death, and is cast aside.

original: 我由此密言晝夜念誦作意。
analyzed: 我由此密言晝夜念誦作意。
translated: By reciting and contemplating this secret mantra day and night,

original: 得一切佛住大悲智藏菩薩解脫法門。
analyzed: 得一切佛住大悲智藏菩薩解脫法門。
translated: I attained the liberation Dharma door of the bodhisattva who abides in the great compassion and wisdom treasury of all buddhas.

original: 所有繫縛臨當刑戮。🔽水火風賊蠱毒厭禱。
analyzed: 所有繫縛臨當刑戮。 水火風賊蠱毒厭禱。
translated: Those who are bound and about to be executed,🔽those in the suffering and difficulty of various things such as water, fire, wind, thieves, poison, and sorcery,

original: 人非人等種種苦難。🔽由此我於一切有情。
analyzed: 人非人等種種苦難。 由此我於一切有情。
translated: humans, non-humans, and so forth,
by this I am able to be a refuge, protector, and comfort for all beings.
An island, a house, a superior destination.
By the power of this secret mantra,

original: 收攝一切暴惡藥叉羅剎等先令發起慈心哀愍。
analyzed: 收攝一切暴惡藥叉羅剎等先令發起慈心哀愍。
translated: all violent and evil yakṣas, rākṣasas, and so forth are gathered and made to give rise to a compassionate and sympathetic mind.

original: 然後安置立於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 然後安置立於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: Then they are established in unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.
World-Honored One, this secret mantra of mine
has such great authority.

original: 由誦一遍滅除四重皆得清淨。
analyzed: 由誦一遍滅除四重皆得清淨。
translated: By reciting it once, the four grave offenses are eliminated and all are purified.

original: 及犯五無間罪蠲除悉皆無餘。
analyzed: 及犯五無間罪蠲除悉皆無餘。
translated: And the offenses of the five heinous crimes are eradicated without remainder.
How much more so for all the sins that will not be eliminated.

original: 彼人獲得一切無量俱胝那庾多佛積集善根。
analyzed: 彼人獲得一切無量俱胝那庾多佛積集善根。
translated: That person will obtain all the immeasurable koṭis of nayutas of wholesome roots accumulated by the Buddhas.

original: 若聞此心密言若誦若持。
analyzed: 若聞此心密言若誦若持。
translated: If one hears this mind-secret mantra, recites it, and upholds it,
all one's wishes will be fulfilled.

Take both ends and burn them in the fire.
Do not eat day or night.
Twenty-one times, offer the burnt offering into the fire.
Then seek to accomplish the matter.

original: 時觀自在菩薩復說結方隅界密言曰。
analyzed: 時觀自在菩薩復說結方隅界密言曰。
translated: At that time, Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva again spoke the secret words for establishing the boundary of the area, saying:

original: 怛儞也二合他伊里弭里止里弭里底里呬里娑嚩二合引訶引以此密言加持水白芥子或灰應用結界當誦七遍。
analyzed: 怛儞也二合他伊里弭里止里弭里底里呬里娑嚩二合引訶引以此密言加持水白芥子或灰應用結界當誦七遍。
translated: Tadyathā, irimiri, śirimiri, śirimiri, dhirimiri, śariri svāhā - with this secret word, empower water, white mustard seeds, or ash, and use them to establish the boundary, reciting it seven times.

original: 時觀自在菩薩復說奉送聖眾還宮密言曰。
analyzed: 時觀自在菩薩復說奉送聖眾還宮密言曰。
translated: At that time, Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva again spoke the secret words for seeing off the holy assembly to return to their palaces, saying:

original: 怛儞也二合他弭致覩致止致孽縒孽縒婆誐挽引曩哩夜二合嚩路枳帝濕嚩二合囉娑嚩二合婆引嚩南娑嚩二合引訶引誦此密言想奉送聖者歸本宮殿。
analyzed: 怛儞也二合他弭致覩致止致孽縒孽縒婆誐挽引曩哩夜二合嚩路枳帝濕嚩二合囉娑嚩二合婆引嚩南娑嚩二合引訶引誦此密言想奉送聖者歸本宮殿。
translated: Tadyathā, miticatu, śaticatu, niśvā niśvā bhagavān niryāvaṇarūpāya svāhā - reciting this secret word, imagine seeing off the holy beings to return to their original palaces.
I will now explain the benefits and blessings of recitation.

original: 先不修持能成一切事業。
analyzed: 先不修持能成一切事業。
translated: If one has not previously cultivated and upheld it, one will be able to accomplish all tasks.
If there are people suffering from cold and hot diseases,

original: 若一日一發或二日三日四日一發。
analyzed: 若一日一發或二日三日四日一發。
translated: whether they occur once a day, or every two, three, or four days,

original: 若著鬼神彌怛拏毘舍遮。
analyzed: 若著鬼神彌怛拏毘舍遮。
translated: if they are possessed by ghosts, spirits, mātṛs, or piśācas,
epilepsy, scrofula, white leprosy,
as well as poison from蠱毒 and poisonous insects, etc.,

original: 加持土芥子和白檀香一七遍塗即愈。
analyzed: 加持土芥子和白檀香一七遍塗即愈。
translated: empower some soil, mustard seeds, and white sandalwood incense with this mantra seven times and apply it to the affected area, and one will be cured.
All karmic hindrances will be purified.
If suffering from evil wind, empower some oil

original: 塗即愈。🔽若患耳痛以青木香油。
analyzed: 塗即愈。 若患耳痛以青木香油。
translated: and apply it to be cured.🔽If suffering from earache, use oil from aquilaria sinensis
and decoct it with birch bark to drip into the ear.
The pain will immediately stop.
It can also cure half-headaches.

original: 一切病患處。🔽纔誦加持無不除愈。
analyzed: 一切病患處。 纔誦加持無不除愈。
translated: Wherever one is suffering from illness,🔽as soon as one recites and empowers it, one will be cured.
As soon as one recites it, it will be accomplished.
If one wishes to accomplish it,
use firm, good, and solid white sandalwood incense.
Carve an image of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva,
one foot and three inches tall.
Make eleven heads and four arms.
The first hand on the right holds a rosary.
The second hand grants fearlessness.
The first hand on the left holds a lotus flower.
The second hand holds a water bottle.

original: 其十一面當前三面作寂靜相。
analyzed: 其十一面當前三面作寂靜相。
translated: The eleven faces have a peaceful appearance on the front three faces.
The left three faces have a wrathful appearance.
The right three faces have a bared fangs appearance.
The rear face has a smiling and wrathful expression.
The uppermost face has a tathāgata appearance.
Each of the crowns has a transformation buddha.

original: 觀自在菩薩身種種瓔珞莊嚴。
analyzed: 觀自在菩薩身種種瓔珞莊嚴。
translated: Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva's body is adorned with various necklaces.

original: 像成已於有佛舍利處安置。
analyzed: 像成已於有佛舍利處安置。
translated: After the image is completed, place it in a place with the Buddha's relics.
The reciter wears clean clothes.
If a layperson, observe the eight precepts.
Make offerings three times a day and recite an unlimited number of times.

original: 從白月一日乃至八日後於淨處置此觀自在菩薩形像。
analyzed: 從白月一日乃至八日後於淨處置此觀自在菩薩形像。
translated: From the first day of the bright fortnight until the eighth day, place this image of Avalokiteśvara in a clean place.
Facing west, eat milk or barley.
Burn agarwood, frankincense, and sandalwood.
According to one's ability.

original: 乃至十三日其日食三白食。
analyzed: 乃至十三日其日食三白食。
translated: Up to the thirteenth day, on that day eat the three white foods.
Make extensive offerings.
Take wood from the bodhi tree to light the fire.
Take more wood from the bodhi tree.
Cut it to ten finger lengths.
Dip both ends in frankincense oil.
Recite one thousand and eight times and cast it into the homa stove.
The earth will then quake and the image will also move.

original: 聞從像最上面口中出聲讚修行者言。
analyzed: 聞從像最上面口中出聲讚修行者言。
translated: Hear the sound coming from the mouth at the top of the image praising the practitioner, saying:

original: 善哉善哉佛子汝能勤苦求願。
analyzed: 善哉善哉佛子汝能勤苦求願。
translated: Excellent, excellent! Child of the Buddha, you are able to diligently seek your wishes.
I will fulfill all your wishes.
Grant you accomplishment, flying through the air, invisibility,
Vidyadhara, wheel-turning Dharma King.
Up to being no different from me.
You will definitely attain such accomplishments now.
Next, the second method.
From the fifteenth day of the white fortnight.
Place the image in a stupa of relics.
Fast day and night.

original: 以一百八枚惹底花蘇末那花廣府有誦密言一遍一擲擊像。
analyzed: 以一百八枚惹底花蘇末那花廣府有誦密言一遍一擲擊像。
translated: With one hundred and eight jasmine flowers and somemana flowers, recite the mantra once and throw one at the image.
Then in front of the image,
a great roar will come out.
The practitioner should not be afraid.
Then the earth will quake.
Reciting the mantra should not be interrupted.

original: 即求請願言。🔽願我能與一切無主無依眾生。
analyzed: 即求請願言。 願我能與一切無主無依眾生。
translated: Then make the request, saying:
May I be able to be a great refuge for all sentient beings who are without a master or support,

original: 能滿一切有情一切意願。
analyzed: 能滿一切有情一切意願。
translated: and be able to fulfill the wishes of all sentient beings,
causing them all to be satisfied and attain unobstructedness.
Next, the mantra practitioner,

original: 於月蝕時取酥一兩置於銀器。
analyzed: 於月蝕時取酥一兩置於銀器。
translated: at the time of a lunar eclipse, take one ounce of ghee and place it in a silver vessel,
recite the mantra seven times in front of the image,
eat it himself and give it to others.
All illnesses will be cured.

original: 況能從初蝕乃至月復盈滿。
analyzed: 況能從初蝕乃至月復盈滿。
translated: All the more so if one is able to recite from the beginning of the eclipse until the moon is full again.
If one does not attain siddhi,
Next, the mantra practitioner,
first bathes and purifies himself, wearing clean clothes,
Take orpiment or ox bezoar.

original: 對像前誦心密言一千八遍。
analyzed: 對像前誦心密言一千八遍。
translated: In front of the image, recite the heart mantra one thousand and eight times.
Three kinds of signs will appear.
Then, apply it to the forehead to attain three kinds of accomplishments.
According to its efficacy, superior, middling, and inferior.
If one mixes it with water and bathes the body,
it removes all obstacles and difficulties.
Far away from all inauspicious bad dreams.
Obtaining auspicious prosperity and all things.
All epidemics will be cured.

original: 復次法以香花奉獻聖觀自在。
analyzed: 復次法以香花奉獻聖觀自在。
translated: Next, the method is to offer incense and flowers to the Holy Avalokiteśvara.
Take ghee and empower it one hundred and eight times.
Apply it to the left slightly angry face and forehead.
Subdue all hostile armies.

original: 復次法若人疫牛疫及餘畜疫。
analyzed: 復次法若人疫牛疫及餘畜疫。
translated: Next, the method is that if people have epidemics, cattle have epidemics, and other animals have epidemics,
in front of Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva,
take bitter gourd wood and soak it in mustard oil.
One should perform homa.
Take red thread and make a string.
As thick as a copper chopstick.
Make two strands.

original: 誦一遍作一結乃至七結。
analyzed: 誦一遍作一結乃至七結。
translated: Recite once and make one knot, up to seven knots.
Tie it under the neck or on the topknot of the patient.
Then the epidemic will be removed and relieved.

original: 復次法被拏枳爾等諸魅所持者。
analyzed: 復次法被拏枳爾等諸魅所持者。
translated: Next, for those possessed by Nāgārjuna and other ghosts,
Take white thread as before and empower it.
Tie it on the face of the still one overnight.
Then take it and make twenty-one knots.
Recite the mantra once for each knot.
Tie it under the neck of the patient and they will be cured.

original: 復次法若有他敵及疾疫災禍。
analyzed: 復次法若有他敵及疾疫災禍。
translated: Next, if there are other enemies and disasters of epidemic disease,

original: 不令入國界欲結方隅界者。
analyzed: 不令入國界欲結方隅界者。
translated: Do not allow them to enter the country. If you want to form a boundary,
Burn olibanum and perform homa.
Take the five-colored thread and empower it.
Tie it on the face of the still one.

original: 即成堅固大威德方隅界。
analyzed: 即成堅固大威德方隅界。
translated: Then it becomes a firm and greatly powerful boundary.

original: 復次密言者欲共怨敵異論。
analyzed: 復次密言者欲共怨敵異論。
translated: Next, if the mantra practitioner wants to debate with an enemy,
And wants to win,
They should make offerings to Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.
Use wood from the banyan tree to burn in a censer.
Empower white thread one hundred and eight times.
Tie it to the face of the wrathful one.

original: 一切鬪諍言訟皆悉得勝除息。
analyzed: 一切鬪諍言訟皆悉得勝除息。
translated: In all disputes and arguments, one will be victorious and all will be pacified.
If tied to the peaceful face,
it can remove all obstacles and difficulties.
Next, mix water with various fragrances.
Bathe Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.
Also, empower the bathing water for Avalokitêśvara.

original: 一百八遍浴毘那夜迦像。
analyzed: 一百八遍浴毘那夜迦像。
translated: Bathe the image of Vinayaka one hundred and eight times.
